function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate HVAC operation in the built environment","Impact":"Increased COVID-19 infection risk","Mitigation":"Maximizing fresh air supply in HVAC systems","Technologies":"Improved HVAC systems with enhanced air filtration","People":"Building occupants, healthcare workers, general public","Owner":"Building management, HVAC system designers"},{"Description":"Lack of social distancing and crowd control","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission","Mitigation":"Enforcing social distancing measures, crowd control policies","Technologies":"Crowd modeling and monitoring systems","People":"Patients, general public, occupant in confined spaces","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, public venues, event organizers"},{"Description":"Inadequate occupant presence modeling in confined spaces","Impact":"Increased occupant exposures to viruses","Mitigation":"Effective occupant presence modeling during pandemics","Technologies":"EXPOSED crowd model, crowd modeling systems","People":"Occupants in confined spaces, general public","Owner":"Building designers, occupant presence modeling experts"}]}
